title: Innamorati
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Italians - Australia
abstract: Daughter reflects on her parents' story of courtship and migration
description: Assembled from family photographs, home movies and background music, Roberta Ciabarra narrates a poignant story of her parents courtship and unusual marriage as they migrate separately to Australia to establish a new life.  First created as part of the 3 day digital storytelling workshop conducted at Cinemedia by Nina Mullen and Joe Lambert from the Center of Digital Storytelling, Berkeley, CA.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1001814; Selected works from the digital storytelling program: April 2001; Active; 04 Apr 2001-06 Apr 2001
